data.text:

THURS: Shikasta, The Gabe Dixon Band, Ill Skematic, Michael Maxwell, Rocket Science, Kat Parsons. FRI: Fijuci, Happy Boy, Last Generation, F.O. The Smack Magnet. Peter Tork (The Monkees) & his band Shoe Suede Blues, Sandy Bell & MC Evan Steinfeld (Biohazard), 9, sold out. FRI: Observing Paul, Mannix, Naomi, Illumanati, Ricky Byrd, 8.
